title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.1, Phi 3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; install via npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot (ollama-copilot/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG example: chunk documents, embed with Ollama, and chat over your data.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Maven Central artifact ollama4j.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate offering async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API; crates.io: ollama-rs.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose (rumblefrog/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Redis for quick local RAG setups.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers; NuGet: Ollama.

title: ollama-laravel (mikebronner/ollama-laravel)
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent facade to chat and embed with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rb (ollama-rb/ollama-rb)
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-go (jmorganca/ollama-go)
summary: Early community Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord (nomic-ai/ollama-discord)
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into threads with slash commands and role limits.

title: ollama-slack (tfpk/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models via DMs or channel mentions.

title: ollama-express (clearfeld/ollama-express)
summary: Express.js proxy adding OpenAI-compatible endpoints atop Ollama for drop-in replacement.
